name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Laobaixing Pharmacy Chain Co., Ltd. issued an announcement on the evening of July 30, saying that its chairman Xie Zilong was detained and investigated by the Hunan Provincial Supervision Commission.
Public information shows that Laobaixing Pharmacy has been punished for selling inferior drugs many times in recent years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The defamation case filed by the famous patriotic blogger Gu Yan Mu Chan against the famous Up Master "Feng Ge Wang Ming Tian Ya" is about to go to trial.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 31, the Shuguang City community on Jiangqiao Street, Shangcheng District, Hangzhou, forcibly destroyed the green belt to carry out fire protection rectification. During the process, some owners were handcuffed by special police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CCTV's live broadcast of the Olympic men's gymnastics all-around competition
The comment section was flooded with people praying for Japan to make a mistake.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Match Results:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 31 (released)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 31 (released)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 28, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The operator of the "Brewery Farm" restaurant in Huangpu District said that since July 25, unidentified security guards have been blocking the restaurant's door, preventing the restaurant from operating normally, causing hundreds of employees to face unemployment, and they have occupied the land with just an illegal sign.
The restaurant operator said, "This is a key area for the development of Guangzhou's technology companies. How can companies survive in such a business environment!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, Ma Xiangyu posted a video to report that he was safe, saying that "Director Chen of the Suzhou Internet Information Office personally came to justice using his Weibo account." In addition, on July 30, Lin Xiaoli, the person Ma Xiangyu reported, entrusted a lawyer to send a lawyer's letter to Caixin.com reporter Bao Zhiming, saying that the content of the article reported by the reporter was seriously untrue and asked the reporter to immediately delete the untrue and infringing remarks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 1 (Released) In Fuchuan, Guangxi, a man took on two policemen with a kitchen knife and was subsequently subdued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 28, the US-Japan Defense and Diplomacy 2+2 Conference announced that the US military stationed in Japan will be reorganized into a joint force command led by the commander of the Indo-Pacific Command. Japan and the United States also listed China as the "biggest strategic challenge" facing the region at the conference. 
In response, the Asian Affairs Department of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs made solemn representations, urging Japan to establish an objective and rational understanding of China, stop making irresponsible remarks on China's internal affairs, and stop colluding with certain countries to form "small circles" to create confrontation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to reports, many securities companies and fund companies are conducting a self-examination and self-correction campaign on social media. All employees must check whether the content of the social accounts they manage contains inappropriate remarks, such as showing off wealth, Versailles, industry corruption, etc. A public fund person in Beijing said that the company's technical department has realized the monitoring of employees' personal social accounts, and the crawler program can extract and archive information on social media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, Typhoon Fengmei caused 30 deaths and 35 missing persons in Zixing, Hunan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 20 (Release) Anti-fake internet celebrity "Tietou" said that he believed Jiang Ping's results were not true "This incident is a complete scam" On July 31, Tietou went to the Zhejiang Provincial Bureau of Letters and Calls to report Jiang Ping's fake results and asked Alibaba Damo Academy to respond to public doubts.
An informed netizen said that Tietou first made a big fuss outside Alibaba, and was later summoned by the local police station to understand the situation. Afterwards, Tietou "posed and shouted" at the door of the police station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 1, a recording of a call from the Public Security Bureau of Xiangfu District, Kaifeng City, showed that the local police called the police in other places and asked all localities to control the depositors of Henan Village Bank, especially the depositors who intended to petition in Beijing. 
They also said that similar calls were made every week.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 31, Hunan. A Tsinghua PhD student posted a video saying that he was treated the same as Ma Xiangyu because he reported that the Stomatological Hospital affiliated to Guizhou Medical University spent 100 million yuan to renovate the dormitory for trainee trainees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, official media at all levels have published articles criticizing the concept of "historical garbage time."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/iRHZt9wV4h

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 31, during the Shandong TV program Yellow River Cultural Conference, female soldiers said they were all second-generation military personnel, sparking ridicule from netizens. Netizens responded, "I also want to be a second-generation military personnel, but my father is a farmer," "My grandfather and father are farmers, and so am I. I will follow in my father's footsteps."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some time ago, a Huawei distributor in Wuhu committed suicide by jumping off a building.
He posted a suicide note on WeChat Moments: "I am grateful to the leading brand. I have followed its growth for 20 years but ended up with nothing. Today I pay my debt with my life. Please help me take care of my family and employees, great brand."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Suzhou, Jiangsu, an old man said in an interview, "My pension is only more than 100 yuan a month, not enough for drinking water. I am from the countryside, not a cadre."
To this, netizens replied, "I don't understand. My grandparents also paid public grain. Why do they only pay a few dozen yuan a month?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An institution compiled data from the Ministry of Education and found that the gender ratio of undergraduate enrollment from 2002 to 2022 showed a significant increase in the proportion of women, from 42% in 2002 to 63% in 2022.
The same data also occurred at the graduate and doctoral level.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The collapse of the gymnasium of Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School has entered the trial stage.
The lawyer representing the family of the student asked the Qiqihar Longsha District People's Procuratorate for an indictment, but was rejected.
The video released by the lawyer was subsequently deleted.
On July 30, the mother of a murdered student released a crying video with the caption "It's so hard! Is it so hard to punish the devil? Who is the victim! Don't you have children?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/n5mKk70JqC

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of July 31, local time, China's permanent representative to the United Nations, Fu Cong, publicly stated at an emergency meeting of the UN Security Council that China firmly opposes and strongly condemns the assassination of Hamas leader Haniyeh.
At the same time, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs also expressed its firm opposition and condemnation of Israel's assassination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 29, a man in Guangdong (posted at) asked a supermarket to replace the unpacked cigarettes. After being refused by the store owner, he suddenly stabbed the man with a knife. A customer nearby tried to stop him, but was also chased and hacked by the man.
